DOC.brief_title: Omega-3 Fatty Acid Administration Dialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients CHD 6 month ; Ability read sign consent form ; Have acceptable dialysis adequacy ( Kt/V > 1.2 ) ; Use biocompatible hemodialysis membrane ; Have patent , well function , arteriovenous dialysis access permanent dialysis catheter ( option arteriovenous access ) ; Signs chronic inflammation ( average CRP â‰¥ 5 mg/L 3 consecutive measurement ) Pregnancy ; Intolerance study medication ; Severe , unstable , active , chronic inflammatory disease ( active infection , active connective tissue disorder , active cancer , HIV , liver disease ) ; Diabetes mellitus insulin therapy ; Hospitalization within 1 month prior study ; Malfunctioning arterialvenous vascular access ( recirculation and/or blood flow < 500 ml/min ) ; Patients receive steroid ( > 5 mg/day ) and/or immunosuppressive agent ; Lifeexpectancy le 6 month ; Age le 18 year old ; Atrial fibrillation ( undergoing optional Pulse Wave Velocity ) ; Hypersensitivity organic nitrate , isosorbide , nitroglycerin ( undergo optional brachial artery Doppler ) .
